alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Jackson; Mellette; Todd (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 18 at 8:27PM MDT until April 18 at 9:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Todd County in south central South Dakota... Western Mellette County in south central South Dakota... Southeastern Jackson County in southwestern South Dakota... Eastern Bennett County in southwestern South Dakota... * Until 930 PM MDT/1030 PM CDT/. * At 826 PM MDT/926 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles north of Wanblee to Lacreek Wildlife Refuge, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... George Town around 830 PM MDT. Tuthill around 840 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Harrington and Spring Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
